DOC.brief_summary: This study will test the safety and effectiveness of a range of doses of MK0476 (montelukast) compared to placebo on improved lung function in patients with chronic asthma.
DOC.brief_title: The Safety and Effectiveness of MK0476 (Montelukast) in Patients With Chronic Asthma (0476-388)
DOC.criteria: A person is 15 to 65 years of age. A person has had chronic asthma for at least one year A person is a smoker or has smoked more that a pack a day for more than 10 years before stopping A person has other lung disorders such as COPD (chronic obstructive pulmonary disorder)
